row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEXT_FILE_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TEXT_FILE_NAME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
!Special case for PCK_TEXT-59, PCK_TEXT-54 & PCK_TEXT-60 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS@WINDOWS "&UC4RB_SPECIAL_CHARACTER#" = "&UC4RB_TEXT_ADD_TEXT#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS@WINDOWS "&UC4RB_SPECIAL_CHARACTER#" = "&UC4RB_TEXT_SEARCH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS@WINDOWS "&UC4RB_SPECIAL_CHARACTER#" = "&UC4RB_TEXT_NEW_LINE#"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PUB.INCLUDE.ENCODE_TEXT "TEXT_TO_ENCODE" = "UC4RB_TEXT_ADD_TEXT" $add_text = $EncodedText
:SET &TEXT_SEARCH# = "" :IF &UC4RB_TEXT_SEARCH# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PUB.INCLUDE.ENCODE_TEXT "TEXT_TO_ENCODE" = "UC4RB_TEXT_SEARCH" $search = $EncodedText : SET &TEXT_SEARCH# = -s $search :ENDIF
:SET &NEW_LINE# = "" :IF &UC4RB_TEXT_NEW_LINE# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PUB.INCLUDE.ENCODE_TEXT "TEXT_TO_ENCODE" = "UC4RB_TEXT_NEW_LINE" $new_line = $EncodedText : SET &NEW_LINE# = -n $new_line :ENDIF
:SET &ENCODE# = "" :IF &UC4RB_XML_ENCODING# <> "" : SET &ENCODE# = -enc "&UC4RB_XML_ENCODING#" :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TEXT.PUB.INCLUDE.ENCODE_TEXT "TEXT_TO_ENCODE" = "UC4RB_TEXT_NEW_LINE" $new_line = $EncodedText
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/text-tool.jar" Text AddText ? -f "&UC4RB_TEXT_FILE_NAME#" -t $add_text -p "&UC4RB_TEXT_ADD_POSITION#" ? &TEXT_SEARCH# -r "&UC4RB_TEXT_SEARCH_AS_REGEX#" -w "&UC4RB_TEXT_SEARCH_FILTER#" ? &NEW_LINE# &ENCODE# :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
